gpt_critique.critique: Model B's SDG mappings misinterpret course content; several scores overstate relevance (poverty, life on land, urban sustainability, partnerships). Adjustments suggested.

No Poverty.reason: No explicit poverty alleviation content; course focus is ethics and valuation.

Quality Education.reason: Course goals show strong learning outcomes and professional competencies.

Decent Work and Economic Growth.reason: Explicit outcomes align with professional training in valuation.

Industry, Innovation and Infrastructure.reason: Learning outcomes emphasize practical application and innovation.

Reduced Inequalities.reason: No explicit content addressing inequalities in syllabus.

Sustainable Cities and Communities.reason: Sustainability is implied but not explicitly addressed as an SDG focus.

Life on Land.reason: No explicit focus on life ecosystems; negligible relevance.

Peace, Justice and Strong Institutions.reason: Explicit governance/regulatory elements and ethics justify high score.

Partnerships for the Goals.reason: No explicit partnerships/global collaboration in syllabus.
